title: Warden Sivir/nautilus
body: was in a nemesis draft game yesterday and saw someone had the naut skin, so i checked in the store and its not there ?

replies.body: Battle Boost. A person on my team yesterday bought one and I was using Heartseeker Varus.

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=w0BFm0G9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T03:16:14.217+0000)
>
> Battle Boost. A person on my team yesterday bought one and I was using Heartseeker Varus.

ahh, still pretty weird you can use unreleased skins

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=w0BFm0G9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-14T05:03:16.702+0000)
>
> ahh, still pretty weird you can use unreleased skins

Yeah, I guess it doesn't matter too much though since the chances of getting Warwick, Nautilus, Ashe, Varus or Annie in a Nemesis Draft game AND being Battle Boosted probably aren't that high.
